mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appraisal_signature (class_id, signature, `month`, user_id) VALUES(#{classId}, #{signature}, #{month}, #{userId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE class_id = VALUES(class_id), signature = VALUES(signature)
